name: gold-teeth
effect: The Safari Zone warden's teeth, to be returned to him for hm04.
short_effect: The Safari Zone Warden's dentures. Trade for HM04 (Strength).

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Gold dentures lost
by the SAFARI
ZONE’s WARDEN.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A set of false teeth lost by the
SAFARI ZONE’S WARDEN. It makes his
smile sparkle.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A set of golden false teeth lost by the Safari Zone’s
warden. They make his smile sparkle.
